titles.title: A bill to require the Food and Drug Administration to conduct a study on the effects of radiofrequency radiation in the 5G networks on human health.
Telecommunications Safety Act of 2019
Telecommunications Safety Act of 2019
Telecommunications Safety Act of 2019

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
